01/29/13 | Problem Set 1

A)

T = 8F + 8h d = T / R total = d * N

total = ( (8F + 8h)/R ) * M

B)

packet = 8P + 8h total_size = M * packet total_time = total_size / R

total = ( N * ( M * (8P * 8h) ) ) / R

P = F/M M = F/L

total = ( M * (8F * 8h) ) / R

C)

total_time T_a + trans_time trans_time = total_size / R total_size = M * packet packet = 8P + 4h

D)

total_time = T_a + trans_time trans_time = total_size / R total_size = 8F + 4h

E)

When F is much greater than size of P. Whenever there is a lossy connection between A and B. When there is delay between transmissions between A and B. 1 GB –> A –> R1
